title: Fixed Absolute Gradient
body:
Fixes this

https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp.Extended/issues/81

It although fixes a case where a stroke hat only a miterlimit set and SkiaSharp.Extended.Svg crashed with a null reference exception, There is although an unit test for that in https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp.Extended/pull/82/commits/0407f4ecd1bf8abe978657308cfa434f4fa27c3d

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body: Thanks for this PR, but due the the fact that this library is now deprecated, I would recommend using the far superior https://github.com/wieslawsoltes/Svg.Skia
